channel.title: Tommy Tsz-Ming Lee
channel.description: Recent content on Tommy Tsz-Ming Lee

item.title: Papers
item.description: Manuscripts (Email me for a draft) Under revision. Asymmetries in doubling and Cyclic Linearization. [Lingbuzz] In prep. Aspectual verbs in Cantonese: a split aspect analysis. [with Victor Junnan Pan] In prep. Epistemic indefinites in Cantonese: a case study of mzi In prep. Hyperraising, evidentiality and phase deactivation. [with Ka-Fai Yip] Publications Papers: 2017. Defocalization in Cantonese right dislocation. Gengo Kenkyu 152: 59-87. Proceedings: 2020. TITLE. CONFERENCE.

item.title: Presentations
item.description: here. -- 2020. TITLE, at CONFERENCE, UNI. -- 2021 Specific unknowns: a case study of epistemic indefinites in Cantonese, at LSA 2021. Online. 2020 Indirect evidence as a licensing condition of hyperraising in Cantonese and Vietnamese, at BCGL 13, CRISSP (webinar). [with Ka-Fai Yip] Movement of quantificational heads, at NELS 51, UQAM (webinar). Strength in deontic modals as acceptability and optimality, at NACCL-32, UConn (webinar).
